releaseNotes:
2014.12.7.3:
 Add 1 line parse method.
2014.12.7.2:
 Direct handling the Stream class.
 Initial parameter is set of Html parse mode.
2014.12.7.1:
 Namespace changed "CenterCLR.Sgml".
 More easy usage, HTML parse is default mode.
 Native store app library included.
1.8.11.2014:
 Initial release.
summary: SgmlReader for Portable Class Library. SgmlReader most popular usage the "HTML" parser. (It's scraper!!)
title: SgmlReader for Portable Class Library
